description: This file contains CSS styles for a theme management system, defining styles for light and dark themes as well as styles for components of a React app such as App, App-header, and theme toggle button.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main container for the application, sets the overall layout and theme based on CSS variables.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the App, styled to center its content and respond to theme changes.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button component for toggling between light and dark themes, styled with color transitions and hover effects.
